cougar.description: Definitely not a house cat. Terrifying!

valor_tier_2_reached.recipe_unlock_weapons_5: New Legendary Hood recipe - Blacksmith, Geomancer, and Weaver collaboration!
valor_tier_2_reached.recipe_unlock_weapons_6: New Legendary Mace recipe - Mason, Carpenter, and Engineer collaboration!
valor_tier_2_reached.recipe_unlock_weapons_7: New Legendary Tome recipe - Cook, Herbalist, and Geomancer collaboration!
valor_tier_2_reached.recipe_unlock_weapons_8: New Legendary Mail recipe - Weaver, Engineer, and Blacksmith collaboration!

highlands.description: Uneven valleys and tall cliffs with many lakes and rivers. Default home of the Mountain Folk.

spring.description: Spring in the Highlands is a time of renewal, usually full of windy days and a good time to start sowing. Late snow may rarely occur.

summer.description: Summer in the Highlands is a warm and wet season, often with days of rain and maybe even storms. Strong winds and a cloudless sky will probably prevail, however.

autumn.description: Autumn in the Highlands marks the end of the farming season, with several rainy or cloudy days and perhaps even an early snowfall.

winter.description: Winter in the Highlands can be harsh and severe, lasting slightly longer than the other seasons and with an almost daily snowfall. Get your warm clothes ready!

snow_early.description:
Snow has come earlier this year...
  • Plant growth speed is slightly reduced.
  • Unsheltered hearthlings are too cold to work as effectively.

snow_late.description:
There's still snow to fall this year...
  • Plant growth speed is somewhat reduced.
  • Unsheltered hearthlings are too cold to work as effectively.
  • Unsheltered pasture animals are hurt by the cold.

snow_early_positive.tooltip: I've waited the whole year for this, the snow season is finally upon us!

snow_early_negative.tooltip: Can't believe we're getting snow this early, darkness and cold approaches!

snow_late_positive.tooltip: I'm glad we can enjoy one more day of snow before the snow season ends!

snow_late_negative.tooltip: Winter should be over already, can't believe we're getting such late snowfall...

none.description: There's no ore in detection range below this point.

some.description: There's some ore below this point, but it might be pretty far down.

lots.description: There's a lot of ore below this point, or it's very close to the surface.

tons.description: You're sitting on a gold mine! (But possibly other ores than gold.)

none.description: Either there's no wilderness here, or it's eclipsed by buildings.

little.description: This area is very tame. Try planting trees to *spruce* it up a bit.

some.description: There's some wilderness here, but it won't attract many animals. A few more or larger plants could help.

lots.description: This area is rather wild, and plenty of animals should be attracted to it.

tons.description: It's a veritable Garden of Eden!

big_game.name: Big Game
big_game.description: Large animals produce large cuts of meat, jerky, pelts, and other useful items

rabid_bear.description: There is something unnatural and wrong with this animal...

large_bear.description: This is a very large bear.

slaughter.description: Harvest this wild animal for some of its resources.
slaughter.disabled_description: This wild animal is unfit for slaughtering.

toggle_training_off.description: This hearthling is currently allowed to train. Click to forbid it!

toggle_training_on.description: This hearthling is currently not allowed to train. Click to allow it!

enable_auto_harvest.description: Enable auto-harvesting of this renewable resource whenever it becomes ready again.

disable_auto_harvest.description: Disable auto-harvesting of this renewable resource.

one_handed_footman.description: This Footman currently prefers using a mainhand weapon and a shield. Click to change!

two_handed_footman.description: This Footman currently prefers using a two-handed weapon. Click to change!

dual_wield_footman.description: This Footman currently prefers using a mainhand weapon with an off-hand weapon. Click to change!

one_handed_knight.description: This Knight currently prefers using a mainhand weapon and a shield. Click to change!

two_handed_knight.description: This Knight currently prefers using a two-handed weapon. Click to change!

bow_archer.description: This Archer currently prefers using a bow. Click to change!

crossbow_archer.description: This Archer currently prefers using a crossbow. Click to change!

manage_parties.description: Manage patrol banners and guard zones (not yet implemented) for this party.

hamstrung.description: Moving slower because of precisely aimed wounds.

out_of_balance.description: Inflicting less damage due to being out of balance.

lightweight_gear.description: This hearthling is wearing lighter and more agile equipment!

fracture.description: Armor reduced due to shattering damage.

open_wounds.description: Bleeding 6 health points every 10 minutes for 40 minutes.

shaken.description: Courage is reduced, more likely to despair and run away.

major_fracture.description: Armor greatly reduced due to shattering damage.

minor_fracture.description: Armor slightly reduced due to shattering damage.

major_hamstrung.description: Moving much slower because of precisely aimed wounds.

minor_hamstrung.description: Moving slightly slower because of precisely aimed wounds.

minor_open_wounds.description: Bleeding 3 health points every 10 minutes for 40 minutes.

major_open_wounds.description: Bleeding 10 health points every 10 minutes for 40 minutes.

minor_out_of_balance.description: Inflicting a bit less damage due to being out of balance.

major_out_of_balance.description: Inflicting a lot less damage due to being out of balance.

major_shaken.description: Courage is greatly reduced, very likely to despair and run away.

minor_shaken.description: Courage is mildly reduced, might despair and run away.

ice_trap.description: Can't move! Stunned by an ice trap!

not_in_water.description: This creature is not really adapted to being on land... It has consequences!

level_1_data.training_perk_description: A footman can use Dummies to train up to Level 3 and will increase the allowed limit of Training Equipment by 2
An archer can use Dummies to train up to Level 3 and will increase the allowed limit of Training Equipment by 1
A knight can use Dummies to train up to Level 3 and will increase the allowed limit of Training Equipment by 1

moonbell_transmute_recipe.flavor: Only a skilled hand can harvest the weaker seeds, but the herbs are lost in the process.

marblesprout_transmute_recipe.flavor: Only a skilled hand can harvest the weaker seeds, but the flower is lost in the process.

marblesprout_drying_recipe.description: Dry marblesprout flowers to form a hunk of stone used in ornate furniture.

algae_drying_recipe.description: Dry and press thin sheets of algae that can be used as a herb.
algae_drying_recipe.flavor: It is also used in cooking!

bolete_colony_recipe.description: Use existing fungus to create more colonies to grow into new fungi.

chanterelle_colony_recipe.description: Use existing fungus to create more colonies to grow into new fungi.

winter_morel_colony_recipe.description: Use existing fungus to create more colonies to grow into new fungi.

desert_truffle_colony_recipe.description: Use existing fungus to create more colonies to grow into new fungi.

legendary_parchment_recipe.description: Delicate and precious sheets of decorated parchment for 'The Walk of Cid'.
legendary_parchment_recipe.flavor: So intricate and yet so fragile...

herbalist_hood.description: A protective headgear for desert herbalists.

bronze_crossbow_recipe.description: A strong ranged weapon that is slow but efficient in cracking enemy armor.

steel_crossbow_recipe.description: Not fast but a strong, powerful mechanical weapon that can pierce through armor.

legendary_chainmail_recipe.description: Pieces of silver chainmail linked together for the Vanguard's Chainmail.

legendary_mace_recipe.description: An impressive and powerful knight's weapon.
legendary_mace_recipe.flavor: Engineered to shatter any piece of armor

water_gate_recipe.description: Create a small six-way gate that can be toggled open or closed for controlled fluid flow.

water_pump_recipe.description: Make a pump that will take fluids from the placement level to be released on its upper shaft.
water_pump_recipe.flavor: You can stack up pumps to get water higher and higher!

water_gate_greater_recipe.description: Build a larger and more resistant gate for controlling the flow of fluids.

axle_horizontal_recipe.description: Create a rotating shaft that can take mechanical power forward.

axle_vertical_recipe.description: Create a rotating shaft that can take mechanical power vertically.

axle_gear_box_recipe.description: Build a device that allows you to redirect mechanical power to any direction.
axle_gear_box_recipe.flavor: It can be placed in walls during building - like windows or doors.

bone_clay_recipe.description: Required for creating porcelain and beautiful ornate ceramics.

clay_comfy_bed_recipe.description: It has a lot less sand on the mattress.
clay_comfy_bed_recipe.flavor: For a good night of sleep...

legendary_silk_recipe.description: Gold and silk woven as one for the Elven King Hood.
legendary_silk_recipe.flavor: No regular weaver can weave with natural magic like elves do

legendary_tome_recipe.description: A legendary tome for the followers of the Church of Plenty.
legendary_tome_recipe.flavor: Through the ways of Cid healing shall be done

legendary_headpiece_recipe.description: A strong and deadly headpiece for the Ascendant Star.
legendary_headpiece_recipe.flavor: Made out of rock extracted straight from a meteorite... or not

stone_market_stall_recipe.description: Merchants can visit this stall to buy and sell goods
stone_market_stall_recipe.flavor: All the lonely merchants... where do they all come from?

stone_safety_standard_recipe.description: Use to designate a safety point.

stone_comfy_bed_recipe.description: Much warmer and softer than the stone itself.

blacksmith_fuel_oven_recipe.description: Required for refining certain materials like wood and coal.
blacksmith_fuel_oven_recipe.flavor: A strong fire requires the purest fuel. And that starts with hard work. -Lucan Varius, Artifex Ignis

blacksmith_crucible_recipe.description: Can be used for melting and working metals or creating alloys.
blacksmith_crucible_recipe.flavor: Fire and stone shall give you metal, but with metal and metal you shall... Well, get even more metal. -Lucan Varius, Artifex Ignis

blacksmith_forge_recipe.description: Used to heat and smelt ore into usable metal ingots.

blacksmith_forge_advanced_recipe.description: Improved and more efficient than regular furnaces, this furnace is hot enough to smelt precious metals.
blacksmith_forge_advanced_recipe.flavor: All that is gold does not glitter; but if it does, a good furnace will smelt it. -Lucan Varius, Artifex Ignis

blacksmith_workbench_advanced_recipe.description: This incredible anvil can keep the metal hot for the most intricate and powerful crafts.
blacksmith_workbench_advanced_recipe.flavor: Balance between heating and hammering is essential. Or just do both at once. -Lucan Varius, Artifex Ignis

charcoal_recipe.description: Heat wood in the absence of oxygen to acquire charcoal, a good grade fuel.
charcoal_recipe.flavor: Experts call it 'slow pyrolysis'. I call it BIG BONFIRE!

coke_recipe.description: Heat Lumps 'o Coal without burning them to efficiently produce coke, a good grade fuel.
coke_recipe.flavor: Cook with coal or coke coal to cook with coke?

bulk_charcoal_recipe.description: Skill allows the Blacksmith to more efficiently burn wood, producing more charcoal.

bulk_coke_recipe.description: Mastery of the craft allows the Blacksmith to achieve maximum efficiency in coking coal.

bulk_copper_ingot_recipe.description: An Enhanced Furnace will allow the Blacksmith to use copper ores more efficiently.

bulk_tin_ingot_recipe.description: An Enhanced Furnace will allow the Blacksmith to use tin ores more efficiently.

bulk_iron_ingot_recipe.description: An Enhanced Furnace will allow the Blacksmith to use iron ores more efficiently.

copper_wall_lantern_recipe.description: A beautiful lantern. Place on buildings to provide light at night.

copper_garden_lantern_recipe.description: A small lantern that's placed on the ground. Suitable for lighting paths or small gardens.

iron_helmet_recipe.description: Even more protection for one's head.

iron_platemail_recipe.description: A full suit of iron designed for a new and promising knight.

steel_helm_recipe.description: Strong and not so heavy protection for one's head.

steel_chainmail_recipe.description: A very fancy and strong chainmail suit of armor for a Footman.

light_iron_shield_recipe.description: Not so heavy but also not so strong.

light_steel_shield_recipe.description: Perfect balance between protection and weight.
light_steel_shield_recipe.flavor: The finest defense for a Footman!

silver_shield_recipe.description: A very strong Knight's shield made with silver.

bronze_axe_recipe.description: A heavier alternative for a starting metal weapon. Can open wounds.

bronze_sword_recipe.description: Basic, but better than a sharpened stick. Can hamstring opponents.

iron_battle_axe_recipe.description: Extra large for when you need some extra punch. Can open wounds.
iron_battle_axe_recipe.flavor: 'Are these all of them?' shouted Rovnar 'They might as well make a line'

iron_sword_recipe.description: A strong and well balanced weapon. Can hamstring opponents.
iron_sword_recipe.flavor: 'I AM YOUR KING!' screamed Regnar Icevulf brandishing his sword.

steel_mace_recipe.description: A powerful and reliable weapon for a Knight.

iron_axe_recipe.description: A short and cheap but efficient weapon.

steel_axe_recipe.description: Very good for hacking and slashing.
steel_axe_recipe.flavor: '...and one hearthling after the other they all drew their axes above the shieldwall.' - The Valin Saga

bronze_hatchet_recipe.description: For parrying attacks and attempting counter-attacks. Puts enemies out of balance.

iron_hatchet_recipe.description: A sturdy small axe used for parrying and attacking. Puts enemies out of balance.

steel_dagger_recipe.description: A small and sharp weapon for both offense and defense. Puts enemies out of balance.
steel_dagger_recipe.flavor: 'There are few things as useful that you can conceal as easily' - O.A.E Guidelines

steel_lance_recipe.description: A long and strong Knight's polearm for harassing multiple enemies. Shakes their hearts!

silver_halberd_recipe.description: An intricate and powerful Knight's weapon. Shakes their hearts!

silver_short_sword_recipe.description: A reliable sidearm for an experienced Knight.
silver_short_sword_recipe.flavor: 'And so his blade shone under the sun for it was made not of steel but of the purest silver' - The Walks of Cid

silver_mace_recipe.description: Blunt. Strong. Unstoppable. Can break armor.

silver_mail_recipe.description: Become the real Knight in shiny armor.

legendary_buckle_recipe.description: A beautifully engraved set of buckles for the Elven King Hood.
legendary_buckle_recipe.flavor: Can also be used for an extremely expensive belt

legendary_mail_recipe.description: Chain armor akin to the ones from the Empire's royal vanguard.
legendary_mail_recipe.flavor: It is said the cape was their demise

blacksmith_workbench_recipe.description: Used by the Blacksmith to creating most of their goods.

blacksmith_fuel_oven_ghost.description: Used by the Blacksmith for refining materials through controlled heating.

blacksmith_crucible_ghost.description: Used by the Blacksmith for melting and working metals or creating alloys.

blacksmith_workbench_advanced_ghost.description: Enhanced version of the anvil used by the Blacksmith for crafting.

blacksmith_forge_advanced_ghost.description: An improved and more efficient oven for smelting metals.

mining_helmet.description: A protective iron hat that also includes a light source.

mining_helmet_iconic.description: Can be used by a Worker for additional efficiency. Also provides light.

nutty_poultry_recipe.description: Stirred and fried large poultry slices with spices and nuts.
nutty_poultry_recipe.flavor: Very popular among the hearthlings from the East!

cherry_tart_recipe.description: A delicious and fresh dessert for lazy afternoons.

pie_cherry_recipe.description: A tasty pie that is quite difficult to make.

nut_pralines_recipe.description: Crunchy nuts baked with a delightful caramelized sugar crust.

huntsman_banquet_recipe.description: An exquisite cut of venison seasoned with fruity forest flavors.

cooked_nuts_recipe.description: Shaven and tenderly cooked edible seeds like pines and acorns.

broth_recipe.description: A very nutritious and filling simmer, broth is both an ingredient or a meal on its own.

bone_marrow_recipe.description: Extremely nutritious roast made with animal bones.

boiled_shrooms_recipe.description: Boiling mushrooms will remove most of their impurities and improve their consistency.

shroom_omelette_recipe.description: A satisfying and tasty dish that is also easy to make.

roast_steak_recipe.description: The most prized and delicious cut of meat, slowly grilled on fire.

roast_fish_recipe.flavor: Straight from the sea! Or lake. Or the nearby stream...

fish_pot_pie_recipe.description: A delicious pie with a fish meat and mushroom filling.
fish_pot_pie_recipe.flavor: Better if made with all-'porpoise' flour

raw_rice_recipe.description: Delicious grains ready to be used in other recipes.
raw_rice_recipe.flavor: Who knew grass could be so tasty?

cooked_rice_recipe.description: Boiled to perfection and sticky enough.

dumpling_salmon_recipe.description: A little bread pocket with steamed salmon stuffed inside.
dumpling_salmon_recipe.flavor: A tasty delicacy of the Northern Alliance

fisherman_soup_recipe.description: A hearty and spicy soup that is quite filling.

catfish_tagine_recipe.description: Catfish meat and vegetables simmered in a clay pot.

sushi_recipe.description: A delicious specialty from hearthlings of a very distant land.
sushi_recipe.flavor: A recipe made popular by Rayya's Children caravans that crossed the Pal'Mun

sushi_vegetarian_recipe.description: A vegetarian alternative to an exotic dish.

legendary_ink_recipe.description: Special and gilded ink for illuminated manuscripts in 'The Walk of Cid'.
legendary_ink_recipe.flavor: It is a very... complicated mixture. Don't ask

thatch_pile_recipe.description: Store a large amount of thatching for later use.

cook_mill_powered_ghost.description: Can be used by a Cook for milling. Requires mechanical power to work.

long_bow_recipe.description: A longer cross-section makes it more efficient than an average bow.

crossbow_recipe.description: Not as reliable as a crossbow made with gears but still strong enough to pierce armor.

composite_bow_recipe.description: With a core made of bone and muscle fibers, the stretch allows for powerful arrows.
composite_bow_recipe.flavor: The Hunter and the Hunt as One

training_dummy_recipe.description: It's best to practice with this friendly guy.

legendary_handle_recipe.description: The strong arm of the Ascendant Star.
legendary_handle_recipe.flavor: Long and ornate wooden handle strapped in high quality leather

ladder_recipe.description: It's a ladder that can be placed as part of building blueprints.
ladder_recipe.flavor: Useful for reaching elevated cookie jars.

bundle_of_firewood_recipe.description: Split that log into blocks for twice their efficiency!
bundle_of_firewood_recipe.flavor: Firewood is a common, lower grade fuel

splitting_block_recipe.description: Create a sturdy block for splitting logs.

legendary_hood_recipe.description: A beautiful hood worthy of the finest archer.
legendary_hood_recipe.flavor: No one can really read what is written on it. Looks cool, though.

legendary_cape_recipe.description: A majestic cape tailored for the Vanguard's Chainmail.
legendary_cape_recipe.flavor: Capes like these were proudly worn by the Vanguard

fish_trap.description: Safely capture fish. Will float when placed in the water.

shepherd_hood.description: A wooly hood used by the shepherd.

simple_hatch_wooden.description: A simple hatch for vertical doorways.

simple_hatch_clay.description: A simple hatch for vertical doorways.

simple_hatch_stone.description: A simple hatch for vertical doorways.

simple_hatch_iron.description: A simple, but sturdy, hatch for vertical doorways.

hidden_hatch_wooden.description: A well hidden hatch. Can be locked for passage control.

hidden_hatch_clay.description: A well hidden hatch. Can be locked for passage control.

hidden_hatch_stone.description: A well hidden hatch. Can be locked for passage control.

hidden_hatch_iron.description: A well hidden hatch. Can be locked for passage control.

diagonal_hatch_iron.description: Thick, sturdy iron hatch for your cellar. Can be locked for passage control.

reinforced_clay_door.flavor: Gives a slight feeling of safety

reinforced_wooden_door_lockable.description: Sturdier than your average door. Can be locked for passage control.

reinforced_clay_door_lockable.description: Stronger than your average door. Can be locked for passage control.

reinforced_stone_door_lockable.description: Sturdier than your average door. Can be locked for passage control.

splitting_block.description: Very handy for splitting logs into more useful wood blocks.

moonbell_crop.description: Can be used as a healing herb

003.name: Moonbell
003.description: Beauty is its own reward. (So shiny!)

003.name: Marblesprout
003.description: Beauty is its own reward (Rock solid)

cotton_crop.description: This plant's fiber can be spun into thread

000.name: Cotton Seedling
000.description: A long journey ahead for this one.

002.name: Cotton Bud
002.description: Growing steadily! Should start blooming anytime!

003.name: Cotton Bloom
003.description: It's flowering! Enjoy it while it lasts...

005.name: Immature Cotton
005.description: The plant is drying and the cotton should be mature soon!

000.name: Birch Seed
000.description: Even a beautiful birch has humble beginnings.

003.name: Birch Sapling
003.description: Ready to be transferred to a bigger plot.

birch_tree_crop.description: Out of trees? Get ready to participate in reforestation.

000.description: Even a large tree has humble beginnings.
000.name: Yew Seed

003.description: Ready to be transferred to a bigger plot.
003.name: Yew Sapling

yew_tree_crop.description: Needs more Yew wood? Prepare your plots for reforestation!

paddy_crop.description: Rice grows slowly but is widely appreciated! Requires a flooded Farm Plot to grow.

000.name: Paddy Stub
000.description: Recently planted rice, will need a lot of water to grow up.

001.name: Paddy Tuft
001.description: It's growing taller by the minute!

002.name: Paddy Weed
002.description: Long grasses have emerged and will flower anytime.

003.name: Flowering Paddy
003.description: The grasses are bright green and the windsown seeds will dry soon.

004.name: Mature Paddy
004.description: The ears have dried and the paddy is ready for harvest!

moonbell.description: An herb commonly used for medicinal purposes

marblesprout.description: An uncommon herb that will harden and turn into marble when dried.

dried_algae.description: In their dried and pressed form, algae can be used as a herb.

water_lily_white.description: This beautiful flower from the wetlands can be used as a herb.

water_lily_yellow.description: This beautiful flower from the wetlands can be used as a herb.

water_lily_purple.description: This beautiful flower from the wetlands can be used as a herb.

water_lily_pink.description: This beautiful flower from the wetlands can be used as a herb.

daisy.description: A common herb often used for decorations.

marble_stone.description: Used by masons to make really pretty stone works!

feldspar_stone.description: A not so ordinary rock, feldspar can be used to create porcelain

thatch_bale.description: Dry grass that can be turned into fodder or used as thatch in crafting.

bear_pelt.description: A large fur from a ferocious creature.

bone_material.description: Common bones from an average creature

bone_clay_mound.description: Use it in pottery to make really pretty porcelain!

ball_clay_mound.description: A smooth, pale clay often found near water. Can be used to make Bone Clay.

shale_clay_mound.description: Is it stone? Is it clay? It can surely be used as either!

cotton_bundle.description: Soft to the touch. Spinnable into thread

piece_of_charcoal.description: A block of slowly burnt wood that can be used as a good grade fuel.

everglowing_ember.description: So pretty... It never stops glowing! Used as a higher grade fuel or by the Magmasmith.

lump_of_coal.description: Sizable chunks of solid coal that can be used as a good grade fuel.

hunk_of_hard_coal.description: A large bit of black coal, full of energy to be used as a higher grade fuel.

slab_of_coke.description: An efficient good grade fuel refined from regular coal.

chunk_of_brown_coal.description: A soft and less efficient kind of coal that can be used as a lower grade fuel.

bundle_of_firewood.description: Split blocks of wood that can be efficiently used as a lower grade fuel.

bit_of_peat.description: Organic residue found in bogs and moors. Can be used as a lower grade fuel.

green_algae.description: Algae have many uses, especially in cooking and herbalism.

red_algae.description: Much coveted for cooking, red algae has several uses.

brown_algae.description: Also known as kelp, has many uses in herbalism and cooking.

infused_earth_essence.description: The essence of the Hearth infused with industrial fire.

lock.description: Used to craft locked doors and mechanisms.
lock.flavor: Look out to not lock someone out

legendary_silk.description: Gold and silk woven as one for the Elven King Hood.

legendary_buckle.description: A beautifully engraved set of buckles for the Elven King Hood.

legendary_cape.description: A majestic cape tailored for the Vanguard's Chainmail.

legendary_chainmail.description: Pieces of silver chainmail linked together for the Vanguard's Chainmail.

legendary_handle.description: The strong arm of the Ascendant Star.

legendary_headpiece.description: A strong and deadly headpiece for the Ascendant Star.

legendary_ink.description: Special and gilded ink for illuminated manuscripts in 'The Walk of Cid'.

legendary_parchment.description: Delicate and precious sheets of decorated parchment for 'The Walk of Cid'.

brass_plate.description: A sheet of cheap but durable metal.

steel_plate.description: A sheet of strong and valuable metal.

trees.stump_description: Not a tree anymore... The stump can be harvested to clear space for more trees or buildings.

ancient_birch_tree.description: A tree as old as time.

large_birch_tree.description: Tall and strong entity of the forest.

medium_birch_tree.description: Beautiful with its unique bark coloring.

sapling_birch_tree_iconic.description: Plant it in the earth and watch it grow.

tree_birch_seed_ghost.description: Can be planted to grow a pretty tree

small_birch_tree.description: A beautiful and young forest birch.

tree_birch_sprout.description: Just needs some time and care.

tree_parana_pine_seed_ghost.description: Can be planted to grow an unique, beautiful tree.

tree_parana_pine_sprout.description: Just needs some time and care.

tree_parana_pine_plant_bud.description: It's a little pine, although not really a pine...

small_parana_pine_tree.description: Still mostly a pine, but with pretty, stingy leaves.

large_parana_pine_tree.description: Look at those stool buds! Glorious!

sapling_parana_pine_tree_iconic.description: Plant it in the earth and watch it grow.

ancient_yew_tree.description: As beautiful as it is old, it feels almost magical...

tree_yew_plant_bud.description: Already looks ancient but it is so young!

medium_yew_tree.description: A beautiful tree with pretty little fruits during Autumn!

sapling_yew_tree_iconic.description: Plant it in the earth and watch it grow.

tree_yew_seed_ghost.description: Can be planted to grow a bulky, strong tree.

tree_yew_sprout.description: Just needs some time and care.

large_highland_pine.description: So tall the wind bends it!

tree_highland_pine_seed_ghost.description: Can be planted to grow a large mountain tree.

small_highland_pine.description: A short one for the highlands but still quite talll...

tree_highland_pine_sprout.description: Just needs some time and care.

sapling_highland_pine_tree_iconic.description: Plant it in the earth and watch it grow.

tree_willow_sprout.description: Just needs some time and care.

tree_willow_seed_ghost.description: Can be planted to grow a weeping willow.

sapling_willow_tree_iconic.description: Plant it in the earth and watch it grow.

water_pump_ghost.description: It will take fluids from the placement level to be released on its upper shaft.

water_gate_ghost.description: This six-way gate can be toggled open or closed for controlling fluid flow.

greater_water_gate_ghost.description: A larger and more resistant gate for controlling the flow of fluids.

porcelain_bench_ghost.description: Be careful with the cushions when it rains!

porcelain_bench_comfy_ghost.description: Makes for a comfortable living room.

porcelain_display_cabinet_ghost.description: A cabinet to show off all the boring pottery that was made before porcelain!

porcelain_chair_ghost.description: Can also be used as a foot stool!

porcelain_dining_table_ghost.description: The tablecloth allows you to see your porcelain plates.

porcelain_end_table_ghost.description: Decoration can be placed on top of it.

porcelain_shelf_ghost.description: Decorations can be put on top of shelves.

porcelain_table_ghost.description: Even in luxury one might want to eat alone.

clay_comfy_bed_ghost.description: It has a lot less sand on the mattress.

stone_comfy_bed_ghost.description: Much warmer and softer than the stone itself.

porcelain_comfy_bed_ghost.description: For those that want to look fancy even when asleep.

patrol_point_recipe.flavor: With this you can now control your footmens :D

patrol_point_tower_recipe.flavor: With this you can now control your footmens :D

patrol_point_sign_recipe.flavor: With this you can now control your footmens :D

moonbell_plant.description: Can be harvested for healing herbs
moonbell_plant.unripe_description: This plant has been harvested and has not grown back yet

moonbell_plant_seed_ghost.description: Once planted, it will grow into healing herbs

moonbell_plant_sprout.description: Just need some time and care.

moonbell_plant_bud.description: Its almost there! Look, it has buds!

marblesprout_plant.description: This plant can be harvested and dried for marble stones!
marblesprout_plant.unripe_description: This plant has been harvested and has not grown back yet

marblesprout_plant_seed_ghost.description: Once planted, it will grow into a Marblesprout

marblesprout_plant_sprout.description: Just need some time and care.

marblesprout_plant_bud.description: Its almost there! Look, it has buds!

cherry_bush_plant_bud.description: It's almost there! Look, it has buds!

cherry_bush_plant_seed_ghost.description: Can be planted to grow a bush of delicious cherry plums.

cherry_bush_plant_sprout.description: Just needs some time and care.

cotton_plant.unripe_description: This plant has been harvested and hasn't grown back yet.
cotton_plant.description: This plant's fiber can be spun into thread.

cotton_plant_bud.description: It's almost there! Should start blooming soon.

cotton_plant_sprout.description: Just needs some time and care.

cotton_plant_seed.description: Can be planted to grow fiber which can be spun into thread.

cotton_plant_bloom.description: Look at all the blooms! They shall fade away quickly...

cotton_plant_fading.description: The blooms are fading... But it shall give cotton buds soon!

cotton_plant_maturing.description: The cotton buds have started maturing and shall be ready soon enough!

water_lily_white_ghost.description: A pretty flower that can be used as an ornamental decoration or harvested.

water_lily_pad_ghost.description: Beautiful floating leaves that form an exotic decoration.

water_lily_pink_ghost.description: A pretty flower that can be used as an ornamental decoration or harvested.

water_lily_purple_ghost.description: A pretty flower that can be used as an ornamental decoration or harvested.

water_lily_yellow_ghost.description: A pretty flower that can be used as an ornamental decoration or harvested.

statue_anji_the_horrendous_ghost.description: It is said that Anji bravely fought a pack of wolves under the last radiant sun.

statue_sir_onep_and_gary_ghost.description: The eternal Knight of the Potted Plant alongside his loyal companion Gary.

wall_axe_ghost.description: A good retirement for your old friend.

wall_shield_ghost.description: Giving an use to your training equipment.

master_hammer_ghost.description: This beautiful and ancient kind of hammer was used by the first smiths of old.

stone_market_stall_ghost.description: Merchants can set up shop here

brass_sign_blacksmith.description: A wall sign with the mark of the Blacksmith.

porcelain_lamp_ghost.description: Goes really well on a porcelain table.

porcelain_wall_lamp_ghost.description: For lighting up a beautiful place.

porcelain_curtains_ghost.description: Looks good with other porcelain furniture!

porcelain_teapot_ghost.description: A nicely decorated piece of decoration.

porcelain_urn_tall_ghost.description: Very fancy and well painted piece of porcelain.

porcelain_jar_of_feathers_ghost.description: Gloriously giant feathers made of porcelain and textiles.

wombat.description: Its fluffiness inspired the art school known as plushinism. It only eats greens.

monkey.description: It's a sacred monkey! This little fellow eats only vegetables.

panda.description: Cute bear from east beyond Pal'Mun. It prefers vegetables but can eat anything.

cherry_basket.description: Sweet or sour, a tasty fruit for any hour.

cherry_serving.description: A cherry is always on top, even when there's nothing below.

huntsman_banquet.description: A perfectly roasted venison prepared with a bittersweet woodland sauce.

broth.description: Very nutritious but not really exciting.

bone_marrow.description: Extremely nutritious but definitely not satisfying.

chanterelle_basket.description: Delicious mushrooms ready to be eaten!

desert_truffle_basket.description: Delicious mushrooms ready to be eaten!

bolete_basket.description: Delicious mushrooms ready to be eaten!

winter_morel_basket.description: Delicious mushrooms ready to be eaten!

boiled_shrooms.description: A simple yet satisfying boiling of diverse mushrooms.

shroom_omelette.description: Slightly more satisfying than your regular omelette.

steak.description: A high quality piece of raw prime meat.

roast_steak.description: A very fine and premium piece of roasted meat.

rotten.description: It stinks even more than before.

fish_roe_basket.description: Edible fish eggs, tiny and shiny!

fish_big_roe_basket.description: Smaller eggs from bigger and sturdier fish are a very valuable delicacy.

sushi.description: A delicious specialty from hearthlings of a very distant land.

paddy_basket.description: Unmilled grass seeds. Can be turned into raw rice with a mill.

raw_rice.description: Delicious grains ready to be used in cooking.

fish_carp_meat.description: Carp can be very tasty if taken from clear water.

fish_catfish_meat.description: Catfish has a particular, earthen flavor.

fish_salmon_meat.description: Salmon is a very coveted and tasty fish!

fish_trout_meat.description: Trouts have a tender, sweet flavor.

sushi_vegetarian.description: A vegetarian alternative to an exotic dish.

highland_trout.description: An exquisite meal from mountainous regions.

fisherman_soup.description: A hearty and spicy soup traditional to the Ascendancy.

fish_pot_pie.description: A delicious pie with a fish meat and mushroom filling.

dumpling_salmon.description: A little bread pocket with steamed salmon stuffed inside.

catfish_tagine.description: Catfish meat and vegetables simmered in a clay pot.

pasture_grass.description: Tall grass can be grazed on by animals or harvested for later use.

overgrown_pasture_grass.description: Overgrown grass can be grazed on by animals or harvested for later use.

short_pasture_grass.description: Short grass can be grazed on by animals but isn't long enough for thatching.

sprouting_pasture_grass.description: Grass has just started germinating here, not yet as efficient for grazing.

daisies.description: This delicate flowering cover will gently spread into a small patch over time.

chanterelle_ghost.description: A group of delicious edible mushrooms

chanterelle_colony.description: Can be placed to grow into larger, edible mushrooms

chanterelle_spreading.description: The spores have dispersed from the colony and the mushrooms started growing

chanterelle_developing.description: The fungi are sprawling and will soon be large enough!

desert_truffle_ghost.description: Hearty mushrooms that can thrive among the roots of flowers

desert_truffle_colony.description: Can be placed to grow into larger, edible mushrooms

desert_truffle_developing.description: The fungi are sprawling and will soon be large enough!

desert_truffle_spreading.description: The spores have dispersed from the colony and the mushrooms started growing

bolete_ghost.description: A tasty and coveted forest delicacy

bolete_colony.description: Can be placed to grow into larger, edible mushrooms

bolete_spreading.description: The spores have dispersed from the colony and the mushrooms started growing

bolete_developing.description: The fungi are sprawling and will soon be large enough!

winter_morel_ghost.description: A very sought of northern fungi that tastes great!

winter_morel_colony.description: Can be placed to grow into larger, edible mushrooms

winter_morel_spreading.description: The spores have dispersed from the colony and the mushrooms started growing

winter_morel_developing.description: The fungi are sprawling and will soon be large enough!

cougar.description: A large, graceful feline. It's a meat eating hunter.

cougar_cub.description: Not so big, still a cat.

wolf_cub.description: Like a little doggo that wants to eat you!

iron_platemail.description: A full suit of knightly iron armor.

steel_chainmail.description: A very fancy and strong chainmail suit of armor.

steel_helm.description: Strong and not so heavy protection for your head.

light_iron_shield.description: Not so heavy but also not so strong, better than a bronze buckler.

light_steel_shield.description: Perfect balance between protection and weight for a Footman.

silver_shield.description: A very strong and light shield made with silver.

silver_mail.description: A shiny and strong suit of armor, worthy of the best Knight!

legendary_hood.description: A beautiful hood worthy of the finest archer.

legendary_mail.description: Chain armor akin to the ones from the Empire's royal vanguard.

iron_battle_axe.description: Extra large for when you need some extra punch. (Two-handed)

bronze_axe.description: A heavier alternative for a starting metal weapon. (Two-handed)

iron_short_sword.description: A short but efficient knight's sidearm.

iron_sword.description: A strong and well balanced weapon for foot soldiers.

steel_mace.description: A powerful weapon that will break through armor.

steel_axe.description: For hacking and slashing onto victory.

bronze_hatchet.description: For parrying attacks and attempting counter-attacks. (Off-hand)

iron_hatchet.description: A sturdy small axe used for parrying and attacking. (Off-hand)

steel_dagger.description: A small and sharp weapon for both offense and defense. (Off-hand)

steel_lance.description: A long and strong polearm for harassing multiple enemies. (Two-handed)

silver_mace.description: Blunt. Strong. Unstoppable. Wear it to tear down enemy armor!

silver_short_sword.description: A very reliable and efficient sidearm.

steel_crossbow.description: Not fast but a strong, powerful and piercing mechanical weapon.

bronze_crossbow.description: A strong ranged weapon that is slow but efficient.

crossbow.description: Not as reliable as an Engineer's crossbow but still strong enough.

long_bow.description: A longer cross-section makes it more efficient than an average bow.

composite_bow.description: With a core made of bone and muscle fibers, the stretch allows for powerful arrows.

legendary_mace.description: An impressive and powerful knight's weapon.

legendary_tome.description: A legendary tome for the followers of the Church of Plenty.

dummy_training_ghost.description: It's best to practice with this friendly guy. Requires an engineer for repairs.

decoy_trap.description: Distract your enemies with this extra hearthling! Wait, it is a hearthling... right?

target_training.description: Less dangerous than shooting apples on someone's head.

axle_vertical.description: A rotating shaft that can take mechanical power vertically.

axle_horizontal.description: A rotating shaft that can take mechanical power forward.

axle_gear_box.description: This device allows you to redirect mechanical power to any direction.

axle_horizontal_switch.description: Allows you to toggle the flow of mechanical power on a horizontal axle.

axle_vertical_switch.description: Allows you to toggle the flow of mechanical power on a vertical axle.

source_water_wheel_wooden.description: This device can generate mechanical power if placed on water.

patrol_banner.description: Combat party members will prioritize patrolling between these banners.

iconic.description: Won't last more than a couple days. Better to release it somewhere!

fish_silver_fry.description: A tiny water creature. Will grow into larger fish!

fish_roe.placed_description: These eggs can be harvested or left alone to hatch.

fish_long.description: Is it a pike? Could be a pike.

iconic.description: Won't last more than a couple days. Better to release it somewhere!

fish_big.description: Larger and stronger fish, might be harder to catch!

iconic.description: Won't last more than a couple days. Better to release it somewhere!

fish_carp.description: An agile fish unique to the temperate woodlands.

iconic.description: Won't last more than a couple days. Better to release it somewhere!

fish_carp_fry.description: Will grow into a beautiful carp.

fish_catfish.description: A sluggish fish unique to the desert regions.

iconic.description: Won't last more than a couple days. Better to release it somewhere!

fish_catfish_fry.description: Also known as a kitten fish.

fish_dark.description: They're just literally darker, not evil... of course.

iconic.description: Won't last more than a couple days. Better to release it somewhere!

fish_dark_fry.description: Still growing into a larger fish.

fish_salmon.description: A delicious fish unique to the northern tundra.

iconic.description: Won't last more than a couple days. Better to release it somewhere!

fish_salmon_fry.description: Will be a great salmon one day.

fish_big_roe.placed_description: Big fish eggs can be harvested as caviar or left alone to hatch.

fish_trout.description: A colorful cool water fish that is unique to the highlands.

iconic.description: Won't last more than a couple days. Better to release it somewhere!

fish_trout_fry.description: Still going for the colors of the rainbow.

green_small_algae.description: Not the smallest nor the largest specimen.

green_algae_cut.description: The remains of a larger green alga. Will grow again if underwater and undisturbed.

brown_algae_cut.description: The remains of a larger brown alga. Will grow again if underwater and undisturbed.

brown_large_algae.description: Also known as kelp, it is a quite tall water weed.

brown_medium_algae.description: Also called kelp, this is a good sized water weed.

brown_small_algae.description: Alternatively called kelp, this is not a particularly large water weed.

red_algae_cut.description: The remains of a larger red alga. Will grow again if underwater and undisturbed.

red_large_algae.description: A tall and peculiar water weed.

red_small_algae.description: There are taller water weeds out there...

small_underwater_boulder.description: Harvestable for stone and maybe algae

medium_underwater_boulder.description: Harvestable for stone and some algae

large_underwater_boulder.description: Harvestable for stone and some algae

small_ball_clay_boulder.description: Harvestable for a mound of ball clay

medium_ball_clay_boulder.description: Harvestable for some mounds of ball clay

large_ball_clay_boulder.description: Harvestable for many mounds of ball clay

highland_vine.description: This vine grows and spreads across walls and building structures until it reaches a mature size.

thatch_pile.iconic_description: Can be harvested for bundles of thatch when placed.

craftsdwarf_party.description: An industrious folk will never let go of their most prized advancements on embarkment and the Artificer is definitely the top of craftsdwarvenship.
craftsdwarf_party.tooltip: Gets you started early with the most advanced crafts.

kingdom.quote: Nature, balance and mighty shall always be the one and only struggle.
kingdom.long_description: The strong (and definitely stubborn!) folk of the mountains have thrived in their isolation for centuries and now set out to face a new world with powers and technologies that might come for good or woe...
kingdom.post_selection_description: , reclusive dwarves on the brink of change.

grower_description.description: Growers will tend to plants and fungi alike, caring for underground or surface farms, crafting with herbs and looking after the wounded.

grower_trowel_talisman.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Grower

grower_trowel_equipped.description: Can be used by a Grower for their crafts and to tend plant and fungus alike.

grower_workbench_ghost.description: Used by the Grower for drying, refining and crafting.

grower_terrarium_ghost.description: Used by the Grower to create cultivars, fungal colonies and prepare plants.

grower_workbench_recipe.description: Required for drying, refining and crafting.

grower_terrarium_recipe.description: Can be used to create cultivars and unlock new seeds or spores, fungal colonies and prepare plants.
grower_terrarium_recipe.flavor: Place cultivars anywhere on the world and wait for them to develop into usable forms!

artificer_staff_talisman.description: Required to promote a hearthling into an Artificer

artificer_staff_equipped.description: An advanced device that can channel both the powers of the Hearth and of machines.

sweet_varanus_recipe.description: A highly traditional dwarven meal made with varanus meat and local cherries.

highland_trout_recipe.description: An exquisite meal favorite among the mountain folk.
highland_trout_recipe.flavor: Be sure to cut off the trout's head

brass_plate_recipe.description: Create sheets of cheap but durable metal for furniture and construction.
brass_plate_recipe.flavor: The trick is to melt anything alongside copper

steel_plate_recipe.description: Create sheets of strong and valuable metal for ornate furniture and construction.

artificer_staff_recipe.description: Required to promote a hearthling into an Artificer.
artificer_staff_recipe.flavor: 'And from twisted fires and earthly energies, Brovik whispered life into metal' Artificer Compendium I

brass_sign_blacksmith_recipe.description: A brass plaque with the mark of the Blacksmith to be placed on walls.
brass_sign_blacksmith_recipe.flavor: Specializing in heavy, pointy, dense things!

grower_trowel_recipe.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Grower.

mf_camp_standard_ghost.description: A sign of home for all of the mountain folk!

mf_town_banner_balance_ghost.description: For some it is between the old ways and the new that the mountain folk will find glory!

mf_town_banner_balance_token_iconic.description: A shred from the Banner of Balance, carrying along its blessing.

mf_town_banner_might_ghost.description: It is the belief of many of the mountain folk that only through fire and industry there is progress.

mf_town_banner_might_token_iconic.description: A shred from the Banner of Strength, carrying along its blessing.

mf_town_banner_nature_ghost.description: Many of the mountain folk will always follow the old ways.

mf_town_banner_nature_token_iconic.description: A shred from the Banner of Vitality, carrying along its blessing.

sweet_varanus.description: An exotic specialty of the dwarven cuisine.

sweet_varanus_serving.description: A delicious and traditional meat dish.

box_move.tip_title: Click and drag to select the items to move, then click new locations for each of them as prompted.
box_move.tip_description: Right click to exit this mode

box_undeploy.description: Undeploy these items and return them to a stockpile.
box_undeploy.tip_title: Click and drag to select the items to undeploy.
box_undeploy.tip_description: Right click to exit this mode

box_enable_auto_harvest.description: Enable auto-harvesting of renewable resources that you own (you'll still need to instruct your hearthlings to harvest them).
box_enable_auto_harvest.tip_title: Click and drag to select renewable resources you own to enable auto-harvesting.
box_enable_auto_harvest.tip_description: Right click to exit this mode

box_disable_auto_harvest.description: Disable auto-harvesting of renewable resources that you own.
box_disable_auto_harvest.tip_title: Click and drag to select renewable resources you own to disable auto-harvesting.
box_disable_auto_harvest.tip_description: Right click to exit this mode

heatmap.name: heatmap
heatmap.title: Terrain heatmaps
heatmap.description: This is the heatmap tooltip. TODO: put something useful here.

ore.description: Detect ore several layers beneath the surface: areas appear brighter where ore is abundant or close to the surface.

wilderness.description: See where the world is wilder (or tamer).

farm.water_affinity_range: Fastest growth happens with [str(i18n_data.min)] - [str(i18n_data.max)] water within or around the perimeter of this farm. Current water level: [str(i18n_data.water_level)].
farm.water_affinity_min_only: Fastest growth happens with at least [str(i18n_data.min)] water within or around the perimeter of this farm. Current water level: [str(i18n_data.water_level)].
farm.requires_flooding: This crop must be flooded to grow.
farm.prefers_flooding: This crop grows more quickly when flooded.
farm.prefers_no_flooding: This crop grows more slowly when flooded.

underfarm.substrate_description: You need a layer of organic material to plant undercrops.

gameplayTab.auto_craft_recipe_dependencies_descripti: When crafting an item, the crafters will check the inventory to see if there is sufficient of ingredients to use. If not, then they will add more orders to the queue should they need to to fulfill the original order.
gameplayTab.auto_harvest_enabled_description: When a renewable resource you own becomes harvestable, automatically issue a harvest command on that resource.
gameplayTab.auto_harvest_animals_enabled_description: Animals that you own will automatically produce renewable resources (e.g., your poyos will produce eggs).
gameplayTab.terrain_slice_buildings_description: In Terrain Slice mode, don't render entities supported by visible, non-terrain entities.
